Description: Up for sale is a Limited Edition Tommy Thayer (KISS) Explorer in like new condition, still has the protective film on the pickguard and neck pickup. Includes the white case and all the case candy, including the COA and special strap (still sealed). I've wanted to try one of the Gibson "pointy" shapes for years and decided to give this a try. It plays well (and sounds great!) but the shape just doesn't work for me. The white paint is actually a flake, I've tried to capture it in the pics, but it looks way better in person. Continental US only, no returns, ask any questions before buying.
